docs.text: Ziqi Zhou M.Sc. student at Department of Computer Science and Technology , Nanjing University , Nanjing, P.R.China. CV image/svg+xml CV CV Biography Currently, I am a final year master student at Department of Computer Science and Technology in Nanjing University . My academic supervisor is Prof. Yinghuan Shi . I received my B.Eng. degree in School of Computer and Electronic Information in June 2020 from Nanjing Normal University , fortunately working with Prof. Wanqi Yang . Main Research Interests Domain Adaptation & Generalization Semantic Segmentation Medical Image Analysis Education 2016/09-2020/06 School of Computer and Electronic Information , Nanjing Normal University , Undergraduate student. 2020/09-Now Department of Computer Science and Technology , Nanjing University , Master student. Working Experience 2022/06-2022/11 Research Intern at SenseTime , supervised by Wei Li . Publications "*" indicates the equal contribution Generalizable Medical Image Segmentation via Random Amplitude Mixup and Domain-Specific Image Restoration. Ziqi Zhou , Lei Qi, Yinghuan Shi. European Conference on Computer Vision ( ECCV ), 2022. [ Paper ] [ Code ] Generalizable Cross-modality Medical Image Segmentation via Style Augmentation and Dual Normalization. Ziqi Zhou , Lei Qi, Xin Yang, Dong Ni, Yinghuan Shi. IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition ( CVPR ), 2022. [ Paper ] [ Code ] Deep Symmetric Adaptation Network for Cross-modality Medical Image Segmentation. Xiaoting Han, Lei Qi, Qian Yu, Ziqi Zhou , Yefeng Zheng, Yinghuan Shi, Yang Gao. IEEE Transactions on Medical Imaging ( TMI ), 2021. [ Paper ] [ Code ] Cross-Modal Attention-Guided Convolutional Network for Multi-Modal Cardiac Segmentation. Ziqi Zhou *, Xinna Guo*, Wanqi Yang, Yinghuan Shi, Luping Zhou, Lei Wang, Ming Yang. Machine Learning in Medical Imaging @ MICCAI ( MLMI ), 2019. [ Paper ] Contest \(4^{th}\) Place , The 8th CCF BDCI Remote Sensing Image Segmentation, 10,000 RMB Bonus, 2020. [ link ] Award National Scholarship , Ministry of Education of P.R. China, 2022. Services Reviewer for CVPR 2023 , TMI , JBHI Correspondence Email: ziqi.zhou.cs@gmail.com Office: Room 530, Computer Science Building, Xianlin Campus of Nanjing University Address: State Key Laboratory for Novel Software Technology Nanjing University, Xianlin Campus No.163 Xianlin Avenue, Qixia District, Nanjing 210023, China
